Title: Elizabeth
Production_Co: PolyGram Filmed Entertainment, Working Title Films, Channel Four Films
Cast: Cate Blanchett, Geoffrey Rush, Christopher Eccleston, Joseph Fiennes, Richard Attenborough, Fanny Ardant, Eric Cantona, Vincent Cassel, Kathy Burke, Edward Hardwicke, Emily Mortimer, John Gielgud, Liz Giles, Rod Culbertson, Paul Fox
Plot: A film of the early years of the reign of Elizabeth I of England and her difficult task of learning what is necessary to be a monarch. This film details the ascension to the throne and the early reign of Queen Elizabeth the First, as played by Cate Blanchett. The main focus is the endless attempts by her council to marry her off, the Catholic hatred of her and her romance with Lord Robert Dudley. Written by CharmedGirl47
Keywords: catholic, british royal family, 16th century, throne, protestant
Location: Alnwick Castle, Alnwick, Northumberland, England, UK
Actors: Cate Blanchett, Geoffrey Rush, Christopher Eccleston
Description: Directed by Shekhar Kapur.  With Cate Blanchett, Geoffrey Rush, Christopher Eccleston, Joseph Fiennes. A film of the early years of the reign of Elizabeth I of England and her difficult task of learning what is necessary to be a monarch.
